short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will report if a page is disallowed in robots.txt

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See if a URL is allowed or disallowed in robots.txt for a specific user-agent token. If the URL is disallowed, it will not be crawled by the crawler with the matching user-agent token.
